;Tuesday, October 3, 2023
; ;

;The mountains and rivers are magnificent, carrying patriotic feelings; the culture is colorful, praising the style of the times.

;

;General Secretary Xi Jinping emphasized at the reception celebrating the 74th anniversary of the founding of the People's Republic of China: "Meet the people's growing needs for a better life" and "Continuously enhance the people's sense of gain, happiness, and security."

;

;To promote high-quality development, culture is an important fulcrum; to meet the people’s growing needs for a better life, culture is an important factor. During the National Day holiday, various regions carry out various and exciting cultural activities to create a festive and warm festival atmosphere. People celebrate the National Day while actively participating in spiritual and cultural life and praise the great era.

;

;;Inherit excellent culture;

;

;;Absorb spiritual nourishment;

;

;The excellent traditional Chinese culture is passed down from generation to generation, expressing The resilience, patience and determination shown by the epidemic are part of the Chinese national spirit. During the National Day holiday, people visit ancient alleys, appreciate folk customs, appreciate intangible cultural heritage, inherit the excellent traditional Chinese culture, and absorb spiritual nourishment.

;

;During the National Day holiday, the "Jinwei Folk Custom Garden Party" in the Ancient Culture Street Scenic Area of ​​Nankai District, Tianjin officially opened. In the Tianjin Folk Museum in the scenic area, staff members wearing long gowns and holding folding fans talked and guessed riddles with tourists in interesting dialects. Tourist Wang Kun said: "It is very meaningful to have the opportunity to appreciate intangible cultural heritage items such as Chinese flags and Erkui wrestling during the National Day holiday and deepen our understanding of China's excellent traditional culture."

;

;In Xinhua, Shijiazhuang City, Hebei Province In the district cultural and sports center, an "intangible cultural heritage gathering" attracted many residents to participate. "The sound of the shakuhachi is desolate and vast, and it needs to be played to create an ethereal artistic conception." Cao Hao, the inheritor of shakuhachi production techniques, demonstrated the musical instrument production process on the spot and taught people how to play it step by step. Intangible cultural heritage projects such as guqin playing, leaf carving painting, and Yue's Eight Hand Turns also took turns on the stage, winning rounds of applause. "There are so many cultural activities during the holidays, and there are so many great shows at our doorstep!" said 88-year-old citizen Zhang Rongsu.

;

;On October 2, Wuli Ancient Street in Yongchun County, Quanzhou City, Fujian Province was packed with tourists. At the paper weaving painting research base, intangible cultural heritage inheritor Lin Zhien skillfully demonstrated the weaving skills of paper weaving painting, attracting visitors to experience it together. In an incense shop not far away, tourists were enjoying tea, listening to the piano, and admiring paintings, looking at ease. "Every day, thousands of people come to visit and experience the cultural charm." Huang Yu, the person in charge of Xiangfang said.

;

;“Every time there are major festivals, people of all ethnic groups in Guangxi often beat bronze drums to celebrate and pray for blessings.” On October 2, in the Guangxi Museum of Ethnology, a guide was leading tourists to visit special theme exhibitions such as bronze drum culture. Many parents took their children to participate in experience activities such as bronze drum rubbings and bronze drum lantern making, and watched performances of ethnic musical instruments such as horse bone Hu and Lusheng.

;

;In the small town of Shijingli in Xixian New District, Shaanxi Province, a flying flower order with the theme of "country" is being staged. The scenic spot innovates the integration of culture and tourism, closely follows the theme of national style and rhyme, and launches activities such as poetry flying flower order and "national style" photo taking, attracting many tourists to experience the excellent traditional Chinese culture and spend a culturally colorful holiday.

;

;;Appreciate the magnificent rivers and mountains;

;

;;Express patriotic feelings;

;

;The sky is bluer, the ground is greener, and the water is greener Clearer, thousands of miles of rivers and mountains more colorful. During the National Day holiday, people enjoy the picturesque landscapes of the vast land, feel the great achievements in the construction of ecological civilization in the new era, understand the long history of civilization of more than 5,000 years, and express their patriotic feelings.

;

;The Yellow River Grand Canyon Scenic Area in Zhungar Banner, Ordos City, Inner Mongolia, is surrounded by towering green mountains and green water. "I took my children to see the Yellow River Grand Canyon, feel the magnificence of the mountains and rivers, and also went to Cuijiazhai to look at old objects. I hope my children can understand the historical changes and cherish the happy life now in the beautiful rivers and mountains," said tourist Liu Dan.

;

;The water and sky meet, the breeze blows, gray cranes soar, and reeds rustle. At Chagan Lake in Qiangarros Mongolian Autonomous County, Songyuan City, Jilin, tourist Chen Jia and her family took a boat trip. When the boat reached the middle of the lake, fish jumped out of the water from time to time. "The staff told us that there are now nearly 70 species of fish in Chagan Lake." Chen Jia said, "It is so happy to visit the vast mountains and rivers and see the ecological environment getting better day by day!"

;

;October In Anhui, autumn is in full swing. The green Huangshan pines and colorful deciduous forests complement each other, forming a natural "jigsaw puzzle". Tourist Liao Zuoyan specially brought a national flag to climb the mountain. He also caught up with the flag-raising ceremony held in front of the welcoming pine, and sang the national anthem and celebrated the festival with tourists from all over the world on the top of the mountain. "I wish the country prosperity and prosperity, and wish the people happiness and health!" Liao Zuoyan said, waving the national flag.

;

;In Caobuhu Town, Dangyang City, Hubei Province, farmers bundled straw in the traditional way to create golden wheat stacks. These wheat stacks have become a "check-in place" for tourists. "Take your son to experience our childhood rural life, let him get close to nature, learn more about farming culture and agricultural knowledge, save food, and love labor." Visitor Li Ronghua said.

;

;Longgang Scenic Area in Yunyang County, Chongqing, is surrounded by clouds and mist deep in the mountains. With the opening of the Zhengzhou-Wanzhou high-speed railway, more tourists have come to Longgang Scenic Area to enjoy the scenery of the Three Gorges. The average daily passenger flow this year has been around 30,000. "I have long heard about the magnificent scenery of the Three Gorges. I saw it with my own eyes today and was very shocked." Tourist Chen Bao said, "I am more interested in the history and culture of the Three Gorges. I will study it in depth when I go back and tell it to others."

;

;;Experience colorful activities;

;

;;Stimulate the power of progress;

;

;Chinese-style modernization is the coordination of material civilization and spiritual civilization modernization. In recent days, a series of high-quality cultural activities have been widely carried out in various places, giving the masses a sufficient sense of cultural gain and becoming an important carrier for people to inspire their strength for progress.

;

;In the cheerful rhythm of the song "Beautiful China", teachers and students of Tianjin University of Technology waved national flags and sang in unison. In this celebration with the theme of national unity, teachers and students used band performances, singing and dancing recitations and other colorful forms to show the sincere feelings of all ethnic groups being as close as one family and helping each other, and expressing their patriotism and devotion to the country. A vigorous and high-spirited spirit.

;

;"The five-star red flag is fluttering in the wind, and the victory songs are so loud..." A music-themed flash mob event was held in the square in front of the "One package, three changes" memorial hall in Yanqiao Street, Huishan District, Wuxi City, Jiangsu Province. People played or sang, and gradually gathered in the middle of the square to unfurl the national flag together. This scene attracted more residents and tourists to join in. Yang Li, a student who participated in the activity, said that he also signed up to participate in the "Pursuing the Red Footprints and Inheriting Patriotic Feelings" activity organized by the street and expressed his blessings through singing.

;

;At the East Square of Kuanzhai Alley in Chengdu, Sichuan, accompanied by loud singing, Chengdu Universiade mascot "Rongbao" held hands with college students and danced a cheerful dance, which infected the tourists present. Tourist Li Nana said: "Our country hosted the Universiade and Asian Games this year, and the Chinese team athletes achieved great results. We are extremely proud." During the National Day holiday, Chengdu held the "Rongbao takes you to visit Chengdu" pop-up event, and held the event at the Chengdu Universiade Relevant venues carry out interactive experiences of Universiade projects.

;

;During the National Day holiday, Yuxi City in Yunnan held a series of mass cultural activities such as theme art performances, calligraphy and painting exhibitions, movie screenings, and garden parties. Visitor Li Guoping watched the lantern song and dance performance "Nie Er Returns Home." "The combination of local lantern art and Nie Er's story not only reflects national characteristics, but also demonstrates patriotic feelings. It is inspiring and meaningful.";

;The area around the stage of Yotgan Ancient City in Hotan County, Xinjiang was crowded with citizens and tourists, where the professional performance of the "People's Stage Happy National Day" literary and art exhibition season opened here. Everyone took out their mobile phones to enjoy and record the wonderful singing and dancing performances. Middle school student Azatigul Ahiti said: "From each program, I feel the prosperity of the country and the happiness and beauty of life."

;

;Red flags in the camp of an air assault brigade of the 83rd Group Army Piao Yang, a music party with the theme of "Singing a Loud War Hymn and Striving for a Centenary of the Founding of the Army" was launched. At the party, programs that praised the country's great achievements and showed the fighting spirit of officers and soldiers were staged in turn. Dai Renwei, who enlisted in the army this year, sang with all his heart and won rounds of applause from his comrades. "I want to work with my comrades to realize the dream of building a strong army and contribute the power of youth!" Dai Renwei said.

;

;Culture is not only a spiritual bond that unites people's hearts, but also an important factor in improving people's livelihood and well-being. Looking across the state, the cultural undertakings in the new era are full of vitality, and the cultural innovation and creativity of the entire nation are bursting out. Hundreds of millions of Chinese people have absorbed the nourishment of the five-thousand-year-old Chinese civilization, inspired vigorous strength, and strode forward on the great journey of building a strong country and rejuvenating the nation with unparalleled historical and cultural confidence.

;

;(Comprehensive reporters Gong Xiangjuan, Shao Yuzi, Liu Xiaoyu, Li Zong, Gong Shijian, Zhang Xi, Liu Yiqing, Xu Jing, Fan Haotian, Liu Xinwu, Wu Shaomin, Jin Bo, Yao Xueqing, Song Haoxin, Ye Chuanzeng, Li Yanan, Reported by Li Longyi; Coordinator of this issue: Liu Nian)

;Our newspaper, Beijing, October 2 (Reporter Wang Ke) The Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holiday has entered the fourth day. The national holiday cultural tourism market continues to heat up. New cultural and tourism formats, new scenes, and new models have enriched consumer choices and injected new vitality into the market. Data from the data center of the Ministry of Culture and Tourism shows that in the first three days of the holiday, a total of 395 million domestic tourism trips were made, a year-on-year increase of 75.8%; domestic tourism revenue was 342.24 billion yuan, a year-on-year increase of 125.3%.

;

;During the Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holidays, there is a rich supply of cultural and tourism products. The Ministry of Culture and Tourism relies on national tourist resorts and tourist leisure streets to support the development of more "one-stop" cultural, business, tourism and sports consumption complexes that integrate the experience of "watching performances, tasting delicious food, buying good things, and enjoying beautiful scenery" , providing people with more good places for holiday travel. At the same time, focusing on the rural tourism market, we launched 149 national rural tourism boutique routes with "orange, orange, green and rural scenic spots", inviting tourists to enter the beautiful countryside and enjoy the rich and gorgeous autumn scenery of the countryside.

;

;All regions are increasing the supply of holiday culture and tourism products to bring more high-quality and diverse experiences to tourists. Beijing has launched 30 "Walking in Beijing" differentiated themed boutique tour routes and 6 "Beijing Micro Vacation" destinations, achieving a diversified supply of high-quality holiday cultural tourism products to promote consumption. In the three days before the holiday, Beijing's key tourist attractions (tourist areas) received a total of 6.825 million tourists, a year-on-year increase of 60.6%, an increase of 31.8% over 2019; the cumulative total operating income was 418.758 million yuan, a year-on-year increase of 25.2%, and an increase of 31.8% over 2019. An increase of 89.4%. In Jingdezhen, Jiangxi, activities such as Mid-Autumn Garden Party and Mid-Autumn Intangible Cultural Heritage Appreciation provide tourists with diversified tourism experiences.

;

;This newspaper, Beijing, October 2 (Reporter Zhang Tianpei) The reporter learned from the Ministry of Public Security on October 2: The Mid-Autumn Festival and National Day holiday entered the fourth day, and the traffic volume on the country's main highways continued to run at a high level. As of 18:00 on October 2, the national road traffic safety situation was generally stable, and no major road traffic accidents had been reported. Judging from the node traffic of 700 important passages on 73 expressways and 300 important passages on 53 national highways monitored by the Traffic Management Bureau of the Ministry of Public Security, the traffic volume in the four days before the holiday was significantly higher than the same period last year. The average daily traffic volume of expressways and ordinary national and provincial roads was higher than that of the same period last year. Last year they were 50.2% and 23.3% higher respectively.

;; Tue, 03 Oct 2023 05:26:06 +0800 02版要闻 - 算算高标准农田“三本账”（一线调研）http://paper.people.com.cn/rmrb/html/2023-10/03/nw.D110000renmrb_20231003_1-02.htm
;Tuesday, October 3, 2023
; ;;;;; ;;;;
;;
;

;Figure ①: Plant protection drone in Liaozhong Conduct aerial defense operations on farmland in the district.
;Photo by Zhang Tongbo (People’s Vision)
;Picture 2: High-standard farmland roads in Liaozhong District.
;Photo courtesy of Liaozhong District Agriculture and Rural Affairs Bureau
;Picture 3: Rice fields in Houbianwai Village, Liaozhong District.
;Photo by Ma Shuang (People's Vision)

;
; ;

;The farmland is contiguous and the ground is golden. Driving to Bianwai Village behind Ciyutuo Street, Liaozhong District, Shenyang City, Liaoning Province, a picture with bright colors and distinct layers came into view. Looking closer, the rice plants are knee-high, and the heavy ears of rice are bent over. The fields are dotted with mechanical and electrical wells and water canals, and the mechanical plowing roads beside the fields are criss-crossed, flat and smooth.

;

;“A few years ago, a high-standard farmland construction project was launched in our village. This year, another 4,570.32 acres are planned to be built. At present, 25 new mechanical and electrical wells have been built, and an additional 0.38 kilometers of lining channels have been built.” Zhang Jiahui, Secretary of the Village Party Branch Report a series of numbers.

;

;Stabilize grain production capacity, increase production efficiency, and improve grain growing efficiency. Following Zhang Jiahui, reporters and villagers calculated the "three accounts" of high-standard farmland in the village behind.

;

;;Production increase account——;

;

;;Improve farmland facilities and increase grain production capacity;

;

;Input: mu this year The average government investment is about 3,200 yuan.

;

;Output: The yield of rice per mu is increased by about 60 kilograms, which saves about 60 yuan per mu; the yield of corn per mu is about 750 kilograms, which saves about 50 yuan per mu.

;

;Walking into the village committee office and opening the file cabinet, Zhang Jiahui found a copy of the meeting minutes, which contained a letter of opinion soliciting village representatives for this year's Shenyang high-standard farmland construction project. The signatures of the village representatives were lined up in two rows - "Look! It was unanimously approved! At that time, some villagers said that they would be happy to pay some money for the construction, let alone the state giving us money to repair it?" Zhang Jiahui said.

;

;As early as 2016, Houbianwai Village had carried out high-standard farmland construction, covering 3,800 acres of farmland, built 40 electromechanical wells, 40 water outlets, and excavated dredging channels and paddy field water supply. line. "After the construction was completed, the effect was obvious, and everyone tasted the benefits. So when it was said that high-standard farmland would be built again this year, they all supported it." Zhang Jiahui said.

;

;Villager Zhang Jiayi is a beneficiary of high-standard farmland construction. After cultivating high-standard farmland all his life, he counted it on his fingers, "There are so many benefits" -

;

;The most intuitive benefit is that the roads are easier to walk and the water is easier to drain.

;

;“In the past, there were dirt roads in the fields outside the village behind. It was muddy after rain, making it difficult for people to walk, and it was even more difficult for agricultural machinery to enter the fields. Since the flat tractor roads were built, it has become more convenient to work in the fields. It is also easy to get large agricultural machinery in and out." As he spoke, Zhang Jiayi pointed behind him and said with a smile, the car he bought three years ago can now be driven directly into the fields. "The drainage ditch used to be made of earth. It was exposed to wind, rain, and snow in winter. It broke down and was repaired every year. Grass grew on the ditch, which affected drainage. Since the earth ditch was upgraded to a cement ditch, the water flows faster and the ditch No weeds grow, and drainage is more reliable!"

;

;The most affordable benefit is that the cost of growing grain is reduced.

;

;With complete facilities, water-saving irrigation of contiguous farmland is more convenient; with supporting roads, mechanized operations are no longer difficult. On the roadside, Zhang Jiayi raised his hand and pointed, "This large area is my family's land. We have planted more than 400 acres, with rice and corn covering almost half each." Since the establishment of high-standard farmland, the average water saving per mu of paddy fields has been more than 30 cubic meters. , the amount of chemical fertilizer used per mu was reduced by 20 kilograms. "Counting these two items, rice can save about 60 yuan per mu, and corn can save about 50 yuan per mu." Zhang Jiayi said, "Before the mechanical and electrical wells were built, diesel engines were used to generate electricity. Now that there are mechanical and electrical wells, the cost has been saved. Most of it."

;

;The most important benefit is to ensure harvests despite droughts and floods, and to ensure high yields.

;

;High-standard farmland construction makes up for the shortcomings of insufficient irrigation and drainage facilities and enhances farmland’s disaster prevention, resilience and disaster reduction capabilities. "The west side of the village is black soil, and there were no drainage ditches at first. There was a lot of rainfall one year, and the fields were seriously waterlogged, and a lot of crops were lost." Zhang Jiayi recalled that the year before last, there were droughts in spring and floods in autumn. Because high-standard farmland was built, his family's land was destroyed. There was neither drought nor flood, so we were not affected at all and still had a good harvest. Last year, Zhang Jiayi's family harvested 340,000 jins of corn and 300,000 jins of rice, and earned more than 150,000 yuan from growing grain. "A few years ago, how could I have imagined that this number would be this?"

;

;What makes farmers most comfortable is that there is "zero personal investment" in the construction of high-standard farmland, which is completely funded by the government.

;

;The investment in high-standard farmland construction in Houbianwai Village in 2016 was about 4.95 million yuan, with an average investment of about 1,300 yuan per mu. After the construction, the village's rice yield per mu increased by about 60 kilograms, and the income per mu increased by more than 210 yuan; the corn yield per mu was about 750 kilograms, and the income per mu increased by nearly 200 yuan. This year, the investment in high-standard farmland construction projects in Houbianwai Village is about 14.97 million yuan, with an average investment of about 3,200 yuan per mu. In the future, the income from growing grains is expected to further increase.

;

;Why are villagers like Zhang Jiayi who participated in the high-standard farmland construction project in the last round willing to participate this time? It turns out that this year not only the project area was expanded, but also the quality was upgraded, with higher standards and better facilities: the gravel road was transformed into a cement road, the mechanical and electrical wells were upgraded from 50 meters and 60 meters to 70 meters, and the channels were relined.

;

;In Liaozhong District, there are a total of 39 high-standard farmland construction projects like Houbiianwai Village, with a planned construction area of ​​856,750 acres, achieving full coverage of basic farmland. Last year, Liaozhong District’s grain output reached 1.103 billion kilograms, remaining above 1 billion kilograms for 11 consecutive years, an increase of 234 kilograms per mu compared with 2018, boosting farmers’ income by 80 million yuan.

;

;As of the end of last year, the total area of ​​high-standard farmland in Liaoning reached 34.11 million acres, accounting for 54.56% of the province’s permanent basic farmland area. Thanks to high-standard farmland construction, farmland infrastructure in various regions has been continuously improved, the quality of farmland has been steadily improved, and comprehensive agricultural production capabilities have been further improved, providing solid support for stable and increased grain production. Last year, Liaoning's grain yield averaged 930 kilograms per mu, and its total grain output reached 24.845 million tons.

;

;In July this year, Liaoning issued the "Notice on Actively Using Policy-based Development Financial Funds to Accelerate the Construction of High-Standard Farmland and Improvement of Cultivated Land Quality", which clearly stated that the primary goal is to increase grain production capacity and deepen the political and banking cooperation. Cooperation mechanism, actively explore innovations in investment and financing models, form a diversified investment pattern, gradually build all permanent basic farmland into high-standard farmland, and improve investment standards and construction efficiency.

;

;;Efficiency Account——;

;

;;Improve the quality of farmland construction and increase the efficiency of grain production;

;

;Previously : Each person can plant up to 2 acres of seedlings per day, and each person can harvest 1 acres of corn per day.

;

;Now: a rice transplanter can plant 60 acres of seedlings a day, and a harvester can harvest hundreds of acres of corn a day; the land transfer price has increased by more than 300 yuan per mu, and the intensive utilization rate of land has increased significantly.

;

;There was a stone pole standing by the field, with a switch box hanging on the pole. Zhang Jiayi opened the lid of the box and turned the switch. Accompanied by the sound of "gurgling", gurgling well water is pumped out from the ground dozens of meters deep, pours into a deep and 30 cm wide cement channel, and then flows hundreds of meters along the way, nourishing fields.

;

;With connected canals and connected roads, fields that were once inconvenient to irrigate have now become high-yield fields. High-efficiency water-saving irrigation and large-scale agricultural machinery operations are more convenient, and agricultural production efficiency has been greatly improved.

;

;"As the old saying goes, 'Don't plant rice in June', but in our village, rice planting always had to be postponed until after June. Why? It's so busy! People with quick hands can only plant 2 acres in a day fields. Now, one rice transplanter can plant 60 acres in one day; when harvesting corn, each person used to harvest one mu of land per day, but now one harvester can harvest hundreds of acres in one day." Zhang Jiayi said that agricultural machinery operations It ensures the farming time and saves manpower.

;

;In Zhang Jiahui’s view, high-standard farmland not only improves production efficiency, but also improves intensive land utilization. "Since the establishment of high-standard farmland, the land transfer rate and transfer price in our village have been rising. By last year, the transfer price had increased by more than 300 yuan per mu on average, and the village collective income had increased by 65,000 yuan. The villagers' transfer income has steadily increased.";

;The land has been transferred and time is abundant. Many farmers have also freed up their time to go out to work and make money.

;

;“In the past two years, the income from circulation has increased, so I transferred the land and went to work in a sock factory or cooperative.” Han Guizhen, a 60-year-old villager, said, “This year, my family’s income from circulation per mu of land has increased More than 900 yuan, and you can earn two to three thousand yuan a month by working part-time."

;

;It is not just the farmers who have settled the "big accounts", but also the builders and operators of high-standard farmland. A company in Liaozhong District is responsible for a high-standard farmland project under construction in Houbianwai Village. Han Lin, the person in charge of the company, said: "Our construction period is staggered with the busy farming time. During the slack farming period, the construction period is rushed; during the busy farming period, we would rather slow down the construction progress."< /p>;

;Next to a rice field at the west end of the village, several excavators were waving their "arms" to lay roads in the fields. From time to time, villagers stopped to watch. Han Lin said that they are responsible for more than 20 high-standard farmland construction projects, involving 11 streets in Liaozhong District. From design to construction, they communicate with towns and villages at any time, and then contact village cadres and villagers to ensure that the construction details meet the needs of farmers. "One weekend, a village party secretary called me and said that the villagers were dissatisfied with the slope of the pipeline. We quickly coordinated and made timely adjustments and optimizations."

;

;Liaoning has introduced a full-cycle design, review, and evaluation plan for high-standard farmland projects. In various systems such as supervision, construction, acceptance, management and maintenance, and financial capital investment, the "three-inspection system" of self-inspection by the construction unit, parallel inspection by the supervision unit, and quality sampling inspection of the project legal person throughout the entire process will be implemented, and the construction standards will be further clarified.

;

;If it is well built, it must be well managed and maintained. Shenyang innovatively promotes high-standard farmland "damage project insurance". The construction unit purchases the insurance, and the insurance company performs the repair work of the damaged project within 10 years after the completion and acceptance of the project, and dispatches project supervision during the construction stage. At the same time, the local government has also built an online supervision platform to conduct closed-loop management of key links such as project progress, fund management, and post-construction management and maintenance. It has also formed innovative measures such as "institutional guarantee", "insurance escort" and "IoT monitoring" to effectively ensure the safety of farmland. Engineering facilities continue to perform efficiently.

;

;;Increase revenue collection——;

;

;;Hide grain in the ground, store grain in skills, and increase enthusiasm for growing grain;

;< p>;In the past: Fertilizer was carried on the back and scooped with hands, which was hard work and difficult to control the amount.

;

;Today: The mechanization rate has increased, agricultural technology has been widely used, and the per capita income from agricultural production in Houbianwai Village has increased by 600 yuan.

;

;"Self-test successful, take off in 3 seconds! 3, 2, 1..."

;

;A drone accelerates and rotates its rotor, propels forward over the corn field, and spreads evenly Fertilizer is applied, and the green "ocean" is blown into waves. This is what fertilizing looks like this summer.

;

;“In the past, when fertilizing and spraying pesticides, drones could not land or fly in some areas and had to rely on manpower. Now, the roads are smooth and drones can fly to every corner of the field.” The speaker was 54-year-old Yue Zhihong, a major grain grower in the village behind.

;

;In the early years, drones were not a "good helper" for fertilization. At that time, farmers had to carry heavy fertilizer bags, walk to the middle of the fields, bend down to scoop up the fertilizer, wave it out with their hands, and then walk towards The next piece...it's hard work, and I can't control the amount of fertilizer. Nowadays, drones fly in a circle, efficiently and accurately.

;

;When you walk into Yue Zhihong’s yard, you will see a dazzling array of large agricultural machinery and equipment such as tractors, planters, harvesters, and forklifts. "The agricultural infrastructure is good and suitable for mechanized operations and large-scale production. I have learned several agricultural machinery operations in the past few years. My family planted 600 acres of land this year, most of which are paddy fields, and all are mechanized operations." Yue Zhihong said.

;

;“With high-standard farmland, large grain growers have an even more urgent need for agricultural technology. For every training, everyone is very motivated to sign up.” Agricultural Technology Promotion Station of Liaozhong District Rural Revitalization and Development Center Researcher Yu Kuiwu said that high-standard farmland construction has improved soil fertility and fertility, and new technologies such as soil testing, formula fertilization, and green plant protection have become more widely used.

;

;Zhao Yuxin, director of the Liaozhong District Rural Revitalization and Development Center, introduced that in recent years, as the pace of high-standard farmland construction has accelerated, technologies such as organic fertilizer spreading, water-saving irrigation, and comprehensive rice pest and disease control have been introduced into the fields, and the effects have been More and more farmers recognize it. Last year, the comprehensive mechanization rate of corn and rice in Liaozhong District reached 95.8%, and the rate of drone control of crop diseases and pests reached 85%.

;

;天色暗下来，岳志红戴上头灯，套好手套，骑着三轮车来到稻田边。停好车，拎着桶，深一脚浅一脚蹚进田里。他弯下腰一探手，起身时手上已抓着一只螃蟹。 “秋风起，蟹脚痒。抓蟹得晚上，养蟹得注意喂食，喂豆粕，能壮黄……”不一会儿，岳志红就抓了满满一桶螃蟹。

;

;“我寻思，咱这农田设施都完善，地力也好，就专门跑到盘锦学了技术，村里非常支持。前年我开始尝试稻田养蟹，一水两用，一地双收！这不就多挣了吗？”岳志红在自家的500亩稻田养蟹，去年，水稻收入每亩增加300元，稻田蟹每亩收入500元。

;

;一地双收，农田产出更多效益。在后边外村，越来越多村民开始学技术，发展稻田养蟹、稻田养鸭。在村干部带动下，2021年，后边外村成立喜稻种养殖合作社，吸纳全村九成以上农户加入。去年，稻田养蟹面积达1200亩，产值近380万元，村里还注册了稻田蟹和稻田米商标，拓展电商渠道，进一步增加农产品附加值。

;

;很难想象，几年前，后边外村还是个无项目、缺产业的薄弱村。张家辉回忆道，“耕地少，人均2亩地，还都很碎，每户耕地不连片，有的被分成好几块小田，种起来费劲。那时种粮得靠天吃饭，产量没保障，效益一直上不去。”

;

;如今，乡亲们种粮有了赚头和盼头。 “正因为建设高标准农田，我们才能抓住机会，推动土地流转，发展壮大村集体经济。”张家辉介绍，去年，后边外村人均收入2.5万元，在农业生产方面，人均增收600元，“现在，村里农田是高标准，大伙过的是好日子！”

;

; 

;

; ;

;山河锦绣壮丽，承载爱国情怀；文化多姿多彩，礼赞时代风采。

;

;习近平总书记在庆祝中华人民共和国成立74周年招待会上强调：“满足人民日益增长的美好生活需要”“不断增强人民群众获得感、幸福感、安全感”。

;

;推动高质量发展，文化是重要支点；满足人民日益增长的美好生活需要，文化是重要因素。国庆假期，各地开展丰富多样、精彩纷呈的文化活动，营造喜庆热烈的节日氛围，人们在踊跃参与精神文化生活中欢度国庆，礼赞伟大时代。

;

;;传承优秀文化;

;

;;汲取精神滋养;

;

;中华优秀传统文化代代相传，表现出的韧性、耐心、定力，是中华民族精神的一部分。国庆假期，人们游古巷、品民俗、赏非遗，传承中华优秀传统文化，汲取精神滋养。

;

;国庆假期，天津南开区古文化街景区的“津味民俗游园会”正式开园。在景区的天津民俗博物馆内，工作人员身穿长褂、手持折扇，以风趣的方言与游客对话猜谜。游客王坤说：“在国庆假期能有机会欣赏到中幡、二魁摔跤等非遗项目，加深对中华优秀传统文化的了解，很有意义。”

;

;在河北石家庄市新华区文体中心，一场“非遗雅集”吸引了众多居民参加。“尺八音色苍凉辽阔，要演奏出空灵的意境。”尺八制作技艺传承人曹昊现场演示乐器制作流程，还手把手地教人演奏。古琴演奏、叶雕画、岳氏八翻手等非遗项目也轮番登台，赢得阵阵掌声。“假期的文化活动真丰富，家门口好戏连台！”88岁的市民张荣素说。

;

;10月2日，福建泉州市永春县的五里古街游人如织。在纸织画研学基地，非遗传承人林志恩娴熟地展示纸织画编织技艺，引得游人一起动手体验。不远处一家香坊内，游客们品茗、听琴、赏画，神情惬意。“每天都有上千人来参观体验，感受文化魅力。”香坊负责人黄昱介绍。

;

;“每逢重大节庆活动，广西各族群众常会敲响铜鼓，庆贺祈福。”10月2日，广西民族博物馆内，讲解员正带领游客参观铜鼓文化等特色主题展览。许多家长带着孩子参与铜鼓拓印、铜鼓花灯制作等体验活动，并观看马骨胡、芦笙等民族特色乐器展演。

;

;在陕西西咸新区诗经里小镇，一场以“国”为主题的飞花令正在上演。景区创新文旅融合方式，紧扣国风国韵主题，推出诗词飞花令、“国风”拍照等活动，吸引许多游客前来感受中华优秀传统文化，度过一个富有文化色彩的假期。

;

;;领略壮美河山;

;

;;抒发爱国情怀;

;

;天更蓝、地更绿、水更清，万里河山更加多姿多彩。国庆假期，人们在广袤大地领略江山如画，感受新时代生态文明建设的巨大成就，体悟五千多年源远流长的文明历史，抒发爱国情怀。

;

;内蒙古鄂尔多斯市准格尔旗黄河大峡谷景区，青山巍峨，绿水环绕。“带孩子来看黄河大峡谷，感受山川的壮美，还去崔家寨看了看老物件。希望孩子在大美河山中了解历史的变迁，珍惜现在的幸福生活。”游客刘丹说。

;

;水天相接，微风拂面，灰鹤翱翔，芦苇作响。在吉林松原市前郭尔罗斯蒙古族自治县查干湖，游客陈佳与家人乘船游览，船至湖心，不时有鱼儿跃出水面。“工作人员告诉我们，现在查干湖有将近70种鱼。”陈佳说，“游览辽阔的山河，看着生态环境一天比一天好，真让人高兴！”

;

;十月安徽，秋意正浓，青翠的黄山松和五彩的落叶林交相辉映，拼出了天然的“七巧板”。游客廖作燕特地带了一面国旗登山，还赶上了迎客松前举行的升国旗仪式，与来自五湖四海的游客一起在山巅唱国歌、庆佳节。“祝福国家繁荣昌盛，祝福人民幸福安康！”廖作燕挥舞着国旗说。

;

;湖北当阳市草埠湖镇，农民们以传统方式打捆秸秆，制造出一处处金黄色的麦垛。这些麦垛成了游客们的“打卡地”。“带儿子来感受我们童年的乡村生活，让他亲近一下大自然，多了解一些农垦文化和农业知识，节约粮食，热爱劳动。”游客李荣华说。

;

;重庆云阳县龙缸景区，群山深处云雾缭绕。随着郑万高铁开通，更多游客来到龙缸景区，欣赏三峡风光，今年以来日均客流量在3万人次左右。“早就听说三峡景色壮丽，今天亲眼见证，很受震撼。”游客陈宝说，“我对有关三峡的历史文化更感兴趣了，回去要深入研究，讲给别人听。”

;

;;体验多彩活动;

;

;;激扬奋进力量;

;

;中国式现代化是物质文明和精神文明相协调的现代化。连日来，一系列高质量的文化活动在各地广泛开展，带给群众充足的文化获得感，也成为人们激扬奋进力量的重要载体。

;

;在歌曲《美丽中国》欢快的节奏中，天津工业大学的师生们挥舞国旗，齐声合唱。在这场以民族团结为主题的庆祝活动中，师生们通过乐队演奏、歌舞朗诵等丰富多彩的形式，展现了各民族亲如一家、守望相助的真挚情感，抒发了爱国报国的拳拳之心和踔厉奋发的昂扬志气。

;

;“五星红旗迎风飘扬，胜利歌声多么响亮……”江苏无锡市惠山区堰桥街道“一包三改”纪念馆前的广场上，举办了一场音乐主题快闪活动，人们或弹或唱，逐渐汇聚到广场中间，一起展开国旗，这样的场面，又吸引了更多居民和游客加入进来。参与活动的学生杨力介绍，他还报名参加了街道组织的“追寻红色足迹·传承爱国情怀”活动，用歌声表达祝福之情。

;

;四川成都市宽窄巷子东广场，伴随着嘹亮的歌声，成都大运会吉祥物“蓉宝”与大学生们手牵手，跳起了欢快的舞蹈，感染了在场的游客。游客李娜娜表示：“今年咱们国家举办了大运会、亚运会，中国队运动员勇创佳绩，我们感到无比自豪。”国庆假期，成都举办了“蓉宝带你游成都”快闪活动，并在成都大运会相关场馆开展大运会项目互动体验。

;

;国庆假期，云南玉溪市举行主题文艺汇演、书画展览、电影放映、游园会等系列群众文化活动。游客李国平观看了花灯歌舞表演《聂耳还乡》，“本地的花灯艺术和聂耳的故事相结合，既体现了民族特色，又彰显了爱国情怀，催人奋进，很有意义。”

;

;新疆和田县约特干故城舞台周围，站满了市民游客，“百姓大舞台  欢乐庆国庆”文艺展演季专业汇演在这里开幕。大家纷纷拿出手机，边欣赏边记录精彩的歌舞表演。中学生阿扎提古丽·艾海提说：“从一个个节目里，我感受到了国家的繁荣富强、生活的幸福美好。”

;

;第83集团军某空中突击旅营区内红旗飘扬，一场以“唱响嘹亮战歌  奋进建军百年”为主题的音乐晚会火热展开。晚会现场，礼赞国家伟大成就、展现官兵奋斗风采的节目轮番上演。今年入伍的戴仁威倾情献唱，赢得战友们的阵阵掌声。“我要和战友们一起实现强军梦想，贡献青春力量！”戴仁威说。

;

;文化既是凝聚人心的精神纽带，又是增进民生福祉的重要因素。放眼神州，新时代的文化事业生机盎然，全民族文化创新创造活力竞相迸发。亿万中华儿女汲取悠悠五千多年中华文明的滋养，激扬蓬勃力量，以无比坚定的历史自信和文化自信，在强国建设、民族复兴伟大征程上昂首阔步。

;

;（综合本报记者龚相娟、邵玉姿、刘晓宇、李纵、龚仕建、张枨、刘以晴、徐靖、范昊天、刘新吾、武少民、靳博、姚雪青、宋豪新、叶传增、李亚楠、李龙伊报道；本期统筹：刘念）

;粮食安全是“国之大者”，耕地是粮食生产的命根子。

;

;习近平总书记指出：“保耕地，不仅要保数量，还要提质量。建设高标准农田是一个重要抓手，要坚定不移抓下去，提高建设标准和质量，真正实现旱涝保收、高产稳产。”

;

;党的二十大报告提出，逐步把永久基本农田全部建成高标准农田。截至2022年底，全国已累计建成10亿亩高标准农田，能够稳定保障1万亿斤以上粮食产能。

;

;高标准农田“高”在哪里？看农田质量，建成后的高标准农田平均耕地质量可提高约1个等级，耕地保土保肥保水能力显著增强；看产出能力，建成的高标准农田亩均粮食产能一般增加10%—20%，许多农田达到“一季千斤、两季吨粮”；看抗灾能力，建成后的高标准农田项目区实现旱能浇、涝能排，高产稳产，旱涝保收。在确保重灾区少减产、轻灾区保稳产、无灾区多增产方面，高标准农田发挥着重要支撑保障作用。

;

;高标准农田算大账，三重效益凸显——

;

;推动农业转型升级和现代农业发展。集中连片，配套齐全，规模化经营比例比一般农田高30—40个百分点，机械化水平比一般农田高15—20个百分点。

;

;推动农业绿色可持续发展。根据调查，高标准农田节肥13.8%、节药19.1%，面源污染大幅度降低。

;

;有效增加农民收入。提高产出效率，增加产出收益；既有效节约水、肥、药、电成本，更大大节省劳动成本。一增一减，有效增加农民收入，一般亩均增收500多元。

;1936年初夏，美国记者埃德加·斯诺冲破重重封锁，进入陕北苏区采访，记录下红军的故事、苏区的故事、长征的故事、延安的故事。访问归来，妻子海伦·福斯特·斯诺帮助他整理书稿和照片资料，为次年《红星照耀中国》（中译本名为《西行漫记》）的问世做了大量工作。1937年4月，斯诺女士冒险访问陕北，在延安采访，写下《续西行漫记》等作品。《西行漫记》和《续西行漫记》被认为是报道和介绍中国共产党和“红色中国”的优秀纪实性作品。如今，斯诺女士的侄孙亚当·福斯特也在致力于促进美中人文交流与合作。

;

;亚当·福斯特是美国海伦·福斯特·斯诺基金会主席。2022年年初，亚当·福斯特致信习近平主席，回顾斯诺女士为美中民间友好所作出的贡献，表示将继承斯诺女士促进美中民间友好合作精神，为美中人民交流互动搭建桥梁。“我们致信习近平主席，也是为了感谢中国人民对斯诺女士的纪念以及对基金会事业的支持。美中两国人民本着友谊的精神进行交往，符合两国的最大利益。”亚当·福斯特说。

;

;2022年1月27日，习近平主席复信亚当·福斯特时指出，斯诺夫妇积极推动了中国工合运动，为创建山丹培黎学校发挥了重要作用。中国人民铭记包括斯诺夫妇在内的国际友人为中国革命和建设事业作出的贡献，以及对中国共产党和中国人民的真挚情谊。习近平主席对海伦·福斯特·斯诺家族多年来为发展中美关系作出的积极贡献予以高度评价，希望亚当·福斯特和基金会继续以斯诺夫妇为榜样，为增进中美两国人民的友谊合作作出新的贡献。

;

;“这是我们永远不会忘记的一天。”亚当·福斯特说，收到习近平主席的回信，整个家族的成员都非常感动。“习近平主席给我们复信，体现出中国国家领导人重视两国人民开展友好合作、搭建交往桥梁。”

;

;亚当·福斯特年轻时曾阅读斯诺女士的回忆录《我在中国的岁月》。书中讲述了中国的“一二·九”运动、西安事变等事件。亚当·福斯特被深深吸引。2016年，亚当·福斯特受邀前往陕西省，参观了斯诺夫妇曾经生活过的地方。所到之处，很多人都能说清斯诺夫妇与中国乃至亚洲的渊源，这让亚当·福斯特深受触动。

;

;那次中国之行后，亚当·福斯特开始着手研究斯诺女士的生平事迹，并通过斯诺夫妇的著作加深了对中国和中国人民的了解。2018年，海伦·福斯特·斯诺基金会成立，并与陕西省斯诺研究中心合作，在美中之间推动开展了斯诺女士纪念日系列活动、线上课程、大型图片展等文化交流活动。亚当·福斯特说：“让世界了解中国，是斯诺女士的事业，也是我们应该继承的事业。”

;

;目前，海伦·福斯特·斯诺基金会正努力从教育、文化、商业、地方关系上着手搭建平台，促进美中双方对话、接触及务实合作。“尽管美中双方在一些领域存在分歧，但两国的交往历史和人民之间的友谊提醒我们，双方存在许多共通之处。我们应致力于团结，而非分裂。”亚当·福斯特说，从商界人士到学者、学生等，美国大多数民众希望美中密切联系、加强合作。作为具有全球影响力的两个大国，美中应该加强友好交往，增进人文交流，搭建起通向和平与繁荣未来的桥梁。

;

;埃德加·斯诺曾如此描述对中国共产党的观察：“那种精神，那种力量，那种欲望，那种热情……是人类历史本身的丰富而灿烂的精华。”亚当·福斯特表示：“正是在这种精神、力量与热情的鼓舞与带动下，中国人民让今天的中国，与斯诺夫妇所处的年代相比发生了翻天覆地的变化。”中国现行标准下农村贫困人口全部脱贫，困扰中华民族千百年的绝对贫困问题历史性地得到解决。2022年，人均国内生产总值超过1.2万美元。“中国全面消除绝对贫困，这是一个非常伟大的成就。中国变得更加现代化，人民生活水平大幅改善，这是全世界都在关注的话题。”

;

;“中国人民的物质生活发生了巨大变化，但是对待外国朋友的友好和热情丝毫未减。无论我们走到哪里，都能感受到中国人民的尊重和善意。”亚当·福斯特说，“我要向中国人民表达我们的敬意。太平洋两岸的美中人民加深相互理解极其重要，希望美国和中国的年轻一代携手合作、增进友谊。”
